page.title: 14MEDICAL RESEARCH LABS.
page.content: At the MRC Laboratories there are two units.The Toxicology Unit, which carries out research on the action of toxic chemicals, including some that might cause cancer. The other unit is the Experimental Embryology and Teratology Unit which studies how embryos develop. Animals such as cats, mice and sheep are used in experiments as well as cells grown in the laboratory. The Home Office sends inspectors to check the experiments are legal. BIBRA (The British Industrial & Biological Research Assoc.) is on the same site but is a separate body. It receives its funds from the Ministry of Ag.Food and Fish. The research it carries out is similar to MRC Labs. and it also examines the safety of chemicals in medicines and foodstuffs.
